title: Episode #685 - Let's Get Gay
description:
Comedians Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J. Gomez, and Dave Smith discuss Luis’ problem with Christine bringing Jay’s dog to his house, the musical stylings of Engelbert Humperdinck, the new Dahmer show on Netflix and the guys’ favorite serial killers, and a ransacking at Wawa. Plus, the guys review the first candidates for Team Rattlesnake at Ellismania Skankfest. All This and More, ONLY on The Most Offensive Podcast on Earth, The LEGION OF SKANKS!!!

Air Date: 09/30/22

Support our sponsors!

  • Go to zippixtoothpicks.com/ and use the promo code LOS10 to get 10% off your order today

Once you're there, sign up to GaSDigitalNetwork.com with promo code LOS to receive a 7 day FREE TRIAL with access to our entire catalog of archived episodes!
